column5: I understand through the post below that the line at International Falls can get long. Does anyone have any information on how the line might be say on a Thursday at around 3:00 to say 5:00 o'clock. This is approximately when we will be crossing. Any info witll be greatly appreciated.ThanksKM
I am sorry. I meant between 3:00 - 5:00 on Friday not Thrusday.KM
I am sorry. I meant between 3:00 - 5:00 on Friday not Thrusday.KM

i got back a 2 weeks ago and i waited for 2 hrs .get there latter in the day that will help the wait . i use to go across in the middle of the night and that is best . my buddy came up this spring at 12.am and had no wait at all good fishing . umpie
3- 5 am, no problem. 3-5pm, you should get across by sunday.
We crossed @ Int'l Falls on June 2 at about 6pm. The wait was about 30-45 minutes. Not too bad. Seen it a lot worse. We came back through Baudette on June 10, only 2 cars ahead of us.
